DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate urine NT-proBNP level new Echocardiographic Findings VLBW infant . The investigator hypothesize high urine NT-proBNP concentration associate hemodynamically significant ductus arteriosus . The investigator also hypothesize new echocardiographic parameter isovolumic relaxation time ( IVRT ) useful prediction ductus intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Urine NT-proBNP Levels Echocardiographic Findings Very Low Birth Weight ( VLBW ) Infants
DOC.detailed_description: Urine sample collect within 24 48 hour age , day 7 , day 14 day 28 life . The sample spin platelet-free urine store -80Â°C NT-proBNP analysis . The NT-proBNP assay perform automate immunoassay ( Roche Diagnostics ) . Color Doppler tissue Doppler echocardiography determine time urine collection . New echo parameter IVRT , tissue velocity , strain strain rate measure compare standard parameter significant ductus arteriosus . Furthermore compare tissue Doppler measurement clinical finding .
DOC.criteria: Written parental inform consent VLBW infant Admitted NICU within 48 hour birth No write parental inform consent Congenital heart disease Death
